prompt: Create a card-based privacy policy interface with a light gray background. Design individual content cards with white backgrounds and subtle shadows for each policy section. Display the main 'Privacy Policy' title in a colored header card with white text on a blue gradient background. Each content card should have rounded corners, contain a colored section header (green for 'Data Protection', orange for 'User Rights', purple for 'Cookies Policy'), and include detailed explanatory text in dark colors. Add navigation dots at the bottom to indicate multiple policy sections, and include a prominent 'I Agree' button at the bottom with rounded corners and gradient styling.
